title: Artificial Intelligence Practical Competency Enhancement: Autonomous Driving Multi-Task Learning and Transfer Learning Practitioner Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design a CNN-LSTM hybrid network structure for implementing multi-task autonomous driving models.
Learners can apply methods to improve model transfer learning efficiency for new scenarios by over 30%.
Learners can verify model performance by building a pipeline for real-world driving data collection, labeling, and training.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
